price: who will receive a humiliating punishment, and upon whom will descend an everlasting punishment.”
arabic: مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ
